title: Inspector Gadget returns
brief_description: Once more Inspector Gadget, his niece Penny and his trusty dog Brain combat the forces of evil. Episode titles: Gadget’s gadget; Mini madness; The Incredible shrinking gadget; Gadget meets the Grappler.
